'''''Adventures in Middle-earth''''' is a role-playing game that had been published by [[Cubicle 7 Entertainment]] between late 2016<ref name="Announce">{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://cubicle7.co.uk/ogl-omg-adventures-in-middle-earth-coming-soon/|articlename=OGL OMG - Adventures in Middle-earth coming soon|dated=27 July 2016|website=[http://cubicle7.co.uk/ cubicle7.co.uk]|accessed=27 July 2016}}</ref> and the first half of 2020.<ref name="TORE">[https://www.cubicle7games.com/unexpected-tor2-update Unexpected The One Ring 2 Update]</ref> 

==Game system==

''Adventures in Middle-earth'' uses the Open-Gaming License (OGL) 5th edition ''[[Dungeons and Dragons|Dungeons & Dragons]]'' rules, specifically adapted for role-playing in [[Middle-earth]].<ref name="Announce" />
